website_summaries.verdict: A good small supply of mass gainer with a focus on protein and other natural builder ingredients.
pros: Works best when mixed into water or milk for a tasty, healthy beverage
Can also be used in a number of recipes and other beverages
Provides a more branched chain amino acids than other options
cons: Hard to dissolve powder into liquids

customer_reviews.title: NOT ACCURATE PROTEIN, DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Along with the ongoing lawsuit about protein spiking- I found the product did not have the allotted amount of protein guaranteed within the product.
customer_reviews.author: brittany romano

customer_reviews.title: You can get better protein
customer_reviews.text: There's better protein powders out there, flavors are pretty good, but they were sued for allegedly "amino spiking" and deceiving consumers a few years back
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein
customer_reviews.text: I only use this protein because it is lowest in price & has great additives that most proteins don't have (ie. BCAAs) I've tried every flavor & they are all delicious. The 4 stars is because I've found the Cookies n' cream very sweet & rich for my liking - I've never been a sweet eater so that's probably why it effects me so much. I'm sure if you love cookies n' cream, you'll love this. If you are looking for a great protein powder this brand will NEVER let you down. I love the brand!
customer_reviews.author: DSutphin

customer_reviews.title: Needs cream, not water. Tastes artificially strawberry with water.
customer_reviews.text: I originally hated this powder because it tasted awful when I prepped it like my other powders. This powder needs less liquid volume than most and something creamy to taste good. Today I added a scoop to 1/2 a cup of Trader joe’s nonfat plain yogurt, with some dried cranberries and nuts to make a protein pudding. IT WAS DELICIOUS. So remember: it tastes artificially sweet and candy-strawberry unless you add 1. Cream 2. Less liquid volume. This stuff tastes wayyyyy better thick and without water at all.
customer_reviews.author: sophy hackney

customer_reviews.title: You Can Make a Frosty Out of This
customer_reviews.text: For the value, this whey powder is really good. Don't freak out over the calories per scoop -- the scoop is HUGE. I would say it's probably twice the size of other protein powder scoops that I have used. I blend one scoop of this, with 1/2 frozen banana, 1 C. Cashew Milk, a little sugar-free vanilla syrup, 1 cup of ice, and 1/2 t. of xanathan gum. The result tastes exactly like a Wendy's frosty. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine R.

customer_reviews.title: I am allergic to chocolate and find vanilla just tastes like ick on most shakes
customer_reviews.text: recovering from gastric sleeve and needed a high protein drink. I am allergic to chocolate and find vanilla just tastes like ick on most shakes. Cannot easily find strawberry powder mix then I saw this on amazon. Love it. Mix in almond milk. Powder takes a bit to dissolve but a little wisk does the trick. Will repeat this order.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Perrier

customer_reviews.title: Contains sucralose
customer_reviews.text: This product contains sucralose. It is the last ingredient and so there is a small amount. We don't know how much really. Sucralose has some bad write-ups and for those who are sensitive to sucralose Please be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The labeling on the product is very deceiving. They claim 60g protein on the front, and then provide very blurry/small photos of the nutrition label on the listing. Unfortunately, it is 60g for TWO scoops rather than just one scoop, which makes it a very high calorie product. As for flavor, it was rather sweet. Tried mixing it with water, and that was awful. It tasted much better when mixed with milk, but still very sweet. One positive: it is filling and helps curb appetite. Overall, dissatisfied. Not ideal if one is cutting calories. It is more suitable if one is in a bulking phase of a cut/bulk cycle where you want to consume more calories than your maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awful packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product came to me with the seal already opened and this is unacceptable because now it means i won’t be able to use it as it is not safe for consumption
customer_reviews.author: TJ B.

customer_reviews.title: contains sucralose
customer_reviews.text: I was in a hurry and did not read the ingredients list closely enough. Had I seen that this product contains the artificial sweetener sucralose I would not have purchased it. It tastes sickeningly sweet. When will manufacturers figure out that people can add their own sweeteners, natural or artificial, to the degree that suits them?
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Contains diabetes-causing Sucralose, an artificial sweetener
customer_reviews.text: The words are blurred in the description. It contains Sucralose, an artificial sweetener. Studies have shown that sucralose:: 1. May Cause Diabetes Daily consumption of diet soda containing the artificial sweetener sucralose increases your risk of metabolic syndrome by 36 percent, and your risk of type 2 diabetes by 67 percent. 2. Increases Risk of Irritable Bowel Syndrome and Crohn’s Disease. In 1991, Canada became the first country to approve the use of sucralose as an artificial sweetener, and in Alberta, Canada, digestive problems such as IBS symptoms, ulcerative colitis and Crohn’s disease increased by 643 percent.. (I became extremely tired and exhibited pre-diabetic symptoms.)
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Great Post Workout.
customer_reviews.text: This was my go to after a workout. Sometimes protein powders taste chalky, but this did not. It also gave me just enough sweet so that I didn't crave sugar. This mixes really well in a shaker. It's not too thick and is better with almond milk. I also use water and it is still good but I prefer milk. I also mix it in with heavy whipping cream for a dessert pudding. I would recommend this as a way to help your muscles after a workout. I also used this as a meal replacement at times.
customer_reviews.author: Lakesha Ellard

customer_reviews.title: Great protein for smoothies... just use one scoop as our bodies wont absorb 60 g of protein
customer_reviews.text: It’s your basic whey protein with creative mono hydrate. Good taste, I like putting it with my smoothie. It says use 2 scoops but using 2 scoops for 60 grams of protein is dumb. Your body will expel what it cant absorb and there are no foods that have 60 grams of protein so don’t follow directions if your a smaller person and aren’t into wasting your money into the toilet. 30 grams of protein in one scoop is enough and you will extend the time you have the protein.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and dissolves easily
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of whey protein and I’m glad I chose this one. The chocolate flavor is delicious. I’ve mixed it with almond milk, macadamia milk, and even black iced coffee and they were all delicious. It also breaks up and dissolves very easily. I don’t need to use a blender or special shaker. I just put it in my sports bottle, add ice, and shake for about 30 seconds. Very convenient and provides a nice amount of protein. It also gives me energy.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Protein Powders for Taste and Price
customer_reviews.text: I used a regular whey protein for my post workout before I found this. They tasted ok, but when I first tried this! - 2 Bananas - 1 Cup Oats - 1.5 Cups Soy Protein Milk - 1 Scoop Body Fortress Vanilla Protein Powder 1000 Calories (I also add a protein bar for a total of 1250 Calories) 55G Protein 70G Carbs 17G Fat 20G Fiber I've used about 5 total different brands of protein powders. This one by far is the most delicious one I've tasted and seen most results in bulking I recommend it for any budget beginner trying to put on muscle mass!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Don't know whats in this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Gave me really bad stomack problems. Don't buy it. Every time I took it I had really bad stomach ache
customer_reviews.author: Sugabunnie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't break down well
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is ok, but mixing it up is the problem. I use a small whisk to mix it in a mug. I wicked it for 5 minutes and It doesn't break down and you get chunks and bits of powder. I have tried a small blender and it was the same and very airy, which made it like drinking pudding with chunks. Won't purchase again. Combat brand tastes better and mixes better
customer_reviews.author: Larry McCormies

customer_reviews.title: Best taste for the price
customer_reviews.text: We've tried a lot of these protein shakes and this is the one with the best taste for the price as far as we're concerned. That being said, we do mix a lot of things into it. Our typical mix would be one scoop of the chocolate whey, 1/2 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of yogurt, 1/2 a banana and a tablespoon of peanut butter powder mixed up in a Magic Bullet with about a cup of ice. It makes a nice thick shake and leaves us satisfied until dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Akey

customer_reviews.title: High Cholesteol but tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It taste great however, I didn't know at the taime that it had more cholesterol then others. It worries me a little because I am on the heavy side but I am building muscle to lose weight and eating very little fat and cholesterol. I will be getting another product too not drink this one so much which is too bad, because it really taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my satiety & hunger problems
customer_reviews.text: In as little as a month I finished the entire thing, and all I have to say is that it really kept me satiated! I may not be that active but this supplement has played a role in my macros, since I over consume a lot of foods that have a ton of carbs. I’ve took my eating habits more serious when I first got it; after finishing I lost about 10 lbs, and now my hunger decreased to a satisfying degree. I’d say it’s done its job 👍
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: So yummy, my favorite flavor!!! Sometimes I will add a scoop of strawberry or a scoop of chocolate with the banana creme flavor with almond milk and ice. Adding a fresh banana can be overpowering in flavor for my taste so this powder is perfect. *Perhaps they can add it to the subscribe and save list like they have with the other flavors too.
customer_reviews.author: Abigayil Abraham

customer_reviews.title: It tastes just like a milkshake
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely delicious! I got the chocolate peanut butter! The taste is not chalky at all. It tastes just like a milkshake. I add banana, chia and hemp seeds and a little extra peanut butter w water. It is such a treat when im done with my workout. Cant wait to try some of the other flavors! So happy i found this cuz the price is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: StephiJ

customer_reviews.title: helps build muacle fast when combined with a workout.
customer_reviews.text: I have added 6lbs of muscle using this with my normal workout in 3 weeks. I would struggle to add 2lbs in a month before using this. I just ordered 2 more. Put it in milk, make shakes with it, add it to smoothies, tastes good! I work out 3 days in consecutive days M,T,W then rest the remaining days. Workouts are about 2 hours. Light art to warm up all muscle groups, then heavy sets to the point of failure. I use the mix twice and day during workout days and one the day after to makensure I have enough protein for the repair process. 6lbs in 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan King

customer_reviews.title: Mixes easily (with spoon) tastes good
customer_reviews.text: The taste could be better for Vanilla. I thought it was a bit too sweet and it made it somewhat harder to chug. Would recommend the chocolate flavor as it's less sweet. But overall, probably one of the better protein powders I've used and at a great price too. Lot's of protein per serving (30grams) and a good amount of calories to go with. The spoon is not too big (maybe half a cup or a little less?) but the powder mixes easily with a water and milk hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: Jero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste, but some issues
customer_reviews.text: I've had some cheap ones and this one is by FAR a lot better tasting for the price. The scoop you add to your drink is huge, compared to others. It also has bit more cholesterol. YIKES! It mixed well the first glass I had, but as I got to the bottom, it was worse and worse. Quite clumpy by the bottom. Also, reading reviews online (I am still new to whey protein somewhat), I found it was not very accurate with how much protein is actually in it. It is the cheapest out there and tasty, though. MUCH better taste than Designer Protein. (BLEH!)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder for a small price
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder. Chocolate peanut butter is my favorite, and the price for two pounds is great! I like it's fairly low carb and high level of protein. Now I'm not a body builder, so I can't elaborate on all the ingredients. I am just unable to eat very many solid foods, and with this protein powder, fresh fruits and veggies, and added flaxseed, it makes yummy, healthy shakes that fill me up and make me feel good. The price is very economical on my small budget!
customer_reviews.author: Babysister66

customer_reviews.title: It's way too sweet. I need to chug my protein in two ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste is beyond gnarly. I got the cookies and cream one and even with cinnamon, it's still unbearable. It's way too sweet. I need to chug my protein in two swigs. I don't take my sweet time to enjoy a protein smoothie. After I lift, I need immediate protein, ALA, creatine replacement. I can't even finish this. You get what you pay for Fam. Going back to Hydro Platinum.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Baitinger

customer_reviews.title: New taste is bitter to supertasters
customer_reviews.text: I hate hate hate hate hate the new taste. This was my favorite product for years. Recently they changed the taste in a way that make it unpalatable for supertasters (those who taste certain flavors as bitter that others don't--it's common). I feel nauseated when I taste or smell it now and it tastes like a bitter raspberry flavor. My spouse, who is not a supertaster, likes the new flavor better. But please go back to the old flavor, which at least we could both enjoy. I am the purchaser in the house, so this product is going bye bye now.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Only protein supplement you need!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a doing any kind of weight lifting, you need this protein shake. It has everything you need and bonus creatine, bcaas, glutamine and taurine. They have several flavors that are all great! My personal favorites are cookies in creame, banana creme and just plain vanilla! half a scoop in my morning coffee and another half with some almond milk after training and Im set. Protein basics are covered plus all the extras for added recovery and increased strength! And the price for all of it is unmatched right now on the market! Six star has something that comes close, but still can't beat it! Give it a shot you won't be disappointed by this company
customer_reviews.author: Tim OKeefe

customer_reviews.title: cookies & cream
customer_reviews.text: got the cookies and cream in 2lbs wish they made it bigger. I read all the reviews before purchasing, people claimed tasted like chemicals.... not true. Upon opening smelled soooo good. I dont drink whole milk so i mixed it with vanilla almond milk a little sweet but if you chug it who cares. To me protein isnt based on taste, most of the time you end up chugging it anyways. The taste is reallly yummy though, a little sweet but who doesnt like that. i do think i need to purchase blender balls now though.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great Chocolate Flavor!! Great Proctuct!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok WoW, FLAVOR MAKES A DIFFERENCE!! Ok, first I bought the strawberry and even though I used skim milk, It's still hard to stomach. My second bottle, I ordered in CHOCOLATE BIG DIFFERENCE!! Taste Great!! The product itself speaks for itself, great company and the energy it gives is amazing. I use it for one of my many small meals. It really gives that full feeling and 60gm of protein per two scoops. But make sure you mix it good! I use my Gatorade shaker bottle, I use 2 scoops to 16oz of Milk. This is a great way to replace protein after workout and enjoy doing it. Take care and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Fister

customer_reviews.title: Low sugar protein
customer_reviews.text: Banana is a hard flavor to find especially one that tastes this good. High in protein, low sugar and only 200 calories per scoop. Tastes great mixed just with water but in a blender with water, ice and a little peanut powder or powdered cocoa it's so good. Update: I just bought the cinnamon swirl and it's delicious. 1 scoop, 1 cup of water and 6-8 ice cubes in the blender makes a healthy, light cinnamon milkshake for a low cal meal on a hot day. I've also mixed it with a cup of Silk vanilla soymilk and it's extra rich and decadent tasting.
customer_reviews.author: CaliGal

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and I feel great
customer_reviews.text: Recently, I got back into working out and I knew I needed to have some food in me to finish off my morning workouts (I'm not a breakfast person). So, I figured I'd give this a try. I was pleasantly surprised that the flavor was excellent and the consistency of the finished shake was spot on. I use shaker bottles to mix with, with a cup of milk, and rarely do I get any clumps in my mouth. I have also had the Banana one and it's just as good.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sjoholm

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to mix in my smoothies as a meal replacement, but was worried about the taste. I got the vanilla so I could blend in berries to make it taste good. I’m actually surprised with how great it tastes alone. When I first got it my blender had broke, so I mixed it with unsweetened almond milk in my husbands blender bottle. It is so good! I finally got my new blender today and was able to make my smoothie and let me tell you.... I am in love. I thought the protein powder would make it taste weird, but it actually adds a nice flavor to it.
customer_reviews.author: S_kh

customer_reviews.title: Not as tasty as some people claim..
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of reviews saying how great this tastes but personally I'm gonna have to disagree. It's not bad and definitely tastes like strawberries but it has a grainy artificial aftertaste to it. I've had plenty of brands of protein. Body Fortress does not have the best rep and at one point were accused of protein spiking. It's good for the value but it's definitely not as good as some brands. But at the price, it's hard to complain too much. The best brand i've tried is Optimum Nutrition. It's more expensive but if taste is important to you, i'd highly recommend giving them a try. Plus they have a ton of flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder supplement!
customer_reviews.text: This protein is a great bargain for the amount of servings per a buck. I’ve been using this protein for the last two months and it has been great, I’ve seen changes and how it had been able to help me progress. The only con I have with it is that the flavor is a little strong especially if you use more than one scoop of protein. I found that one scoop of protein along with 12 ounces of milk is the perfect amount, a little less and the flavor is overpowering and too much the flavor is very weak, but overall love the protein and will continue to using this brand and maybe try a different flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Lien

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm good
customer_reviews.text: Who comes up with the like/dislike criteria? Sheerness? Has anybody answered that one? If you click 5 stars on that one they know you're not legit. Great after back and core session. Perfect meal replacement. Will reorder. Strawberry flavor is real. Mix mine with a banana and a cup of strawberry/banana yogurt. Meal and dessert in one.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: They changed the flavor ever so slightly from a few years ago. Where to me it used to taste like a vanilla shake. Now I’d describe is as tasting almost banana-y. Not a huge fan of that. But it’s not terrible. But not as good imo. I’ll keep using till I run into something better. I ain’t gonna take it to a lab but judging from how my body feels after taking it I’d say most of what they say is in there is probly in there.
customer_reviews.author: Inconspicuous-buyer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is terrible, not good at all. The other problem is that the scoop size is larger than another product I have been using and therefore doesn't give me as much as the other product for the same price. I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Bice

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein !
customer_reviews.text: really great tasting protein ! I like to mix it with almond milk and oatmeal.. and for the price it’s great ! Although 1 scoop is 30g of protein and 2 scoops is 60g.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carmona

customer_reviews.title: "Amazing New Taste" is false advertising
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years, and always enjoyed the Vanilla flavor. The most recent shipment said "Amazing New Taste" on the package. It isn't amazing and it doesn't taste like Vanilla anymore. I can't figure out what it does taste like. I've cancelled my Subscribe and Save of this item and will try to find a replacement product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Yummy strawberry!
customer_reviews.text: I love this whey protein! This is not sickeningly sweet and blends well. I blend 1cup of frozen pineapple, .5cup frozen berries, 1 scoop of whey protein and 1cup water...tastes like a strawberry milkshake! Will totally buy this again👍
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love the product. Hate the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for years and have no issues. However, I purchased again last week and have dropped the container twice on the floor because if I pick it up by the lid, it pops off and the container falls and powder goes everywhere. I do not have this issue with the previous container. I am going to transfer the new batch into the old container, but I'm very disappointed in the current packaging.
customer_reviews.author: DiscoB

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t buy this to build muscle I bought this to gain weight I have an overactive thyroid and I look disgustingly skinny and I can already see a slight difference. The flavor is amazing and I’m going to give you guys my recipe 😂 half a cup of coffee however much creamer you use (flavored!) I like mocha some whip cream cinnamon and three spoon fulls of the powder and honestly you guys smack! I should add they do have a scooper inside when I first bought it I couldn’t find it and assumed there wasn’t one in there but there definitely is so use the scooper they provide it’s in there just buried 😂
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: While I’ve never come across a really good tasting protein shake the flavor of this is decent. Good amount of protein but the cholesterol is high. 33% in one scoop! I will probably buy again but this is not one to have everyday unless the rest of your meals are plant based. It’s a little bland unless you mix with milk and it’s pretty thick. I like my shakes on the thinner side so I add a scoop of powder to 1c milk and 2c water. Doesn’t bother me too much. It just means I get a little extra water for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Offputting flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is horrendous! I was pleased with the other Body Fortress protein powder I bought (Energy, Mocha Cappucino, delicious). This one, however, was disappointing. I love the taste of an actual banana blended into a smoothie, so I thought I’d give this a try. The flavor is so artificial it is offputting. It tasted vaguely like one of those banana-flavored popsicles... except not sweet/refreshing/good. Won’t be ordering this again. This will probably be going in the trash, in fact, unless I can find someone who can stomach the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Hate the new flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the vanilla version of this product for years. It's probably not the most accurate in terms of the amount of protein, but I liked the taste and texture a lot and I just use it to add some protein to smoothies anyway. However the new formula is completely different and I caution return customers to consider looking elsewhere instead of buying the new version.
customer_reviews.author: James Miller

customer_reviews.title: The protein is fine. It just tastes like shit
customer_reviews.text: The protein is fine. It looks fine. It smells fine. But once you drink it. It will shock you how bad it tastes. I cannot believe how horrible this tastes. It tastes like spoiled bland ice cream. Adding sugar will probably not help, but I'll give it a try. Another thing, is that the scoop they give is totally the wrong size and makes it really difficult to measure doses. I highly recommend that you do not buy this product. save your money and buy chocolate protein.
customer_reviews.author: Kea B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product has definitely helped my boyfriend gain more weight. Muscle to be specific. He did one scoop every morning. We bought this product again but in the 4lb container! quality product. I even mixed some in with my hot chocolate when i was mowing my yard a couple weeks ago.. (if you live in mi you'll understand) but it gave me the boost my muscles need to keep push mowing over an acre haha
customer_reviews.author: M. Ormsbee

customer_reviews.title: Weight Gain Powder
customer_reviews.text: This product serves the purpose but the taste is not that great. It is very chalky and doesn't break down well in the liquid. If you can get past that then its manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Mine

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price of this product. I have tried several flavors and find the sweetness pleasing. I like that I can put it in bland items like oatmeal or or plain yogurt and not have to add sweeteners. I could see how some folks might find the sweetness too much, but I think it's perfect for someone who likes sweet but doesn't want to add sugar/honey/fruits to their blend.
customer_reviews.author: Wimpy

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent formulation
customer_reviews.text: I never know what I am going to get with this product. One time, the product is very small granular and consistent in grain size, and the next time it is kind of thick. Also the vanilla flavor can sometimes be subtle and the latest was overpowering with artificial vanilla aroma (not pleasant). I have used this product for years but will not be using it again, once I use up the latest container.
customer_reviews.author: generalp2

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. Big scoop.
customer_reviews.text: Too funny. I bought it because it advertised 60g of protein while others are 26-30G. As it turns out, the scoop is 2x the size of a standard size scoop. and because the scoop is so big I couldn't use it to dump the powder into my mixing bottle. So I'm using a standard scoop (from another product) and probably getting 26-30G of protein. As far as taste, put 2 scoops of your current product into the same amount of water and decide for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Extra protein
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a protien drink. I’m not a bodybuilder, but I like the idea of having a protien shake every now & then. Also, the price is affordable. Plus, the taste is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Patrick Pullon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this protein powder brand for a while; it comes in a nice variety of flavors and does the job at an affordable price in that in the end of the day protein is protein, but probably honestly isn’t the best protein out there and still not necessarily the cheapest per ounce. I recently switched to a 6 lb bag of MusclePharm combat from Costco that was cheaper and came with more, but I might buy this one again in the future for the convenience of shopping online. The flavors are pretty sweet and taste kind of like drinking a milkshake, which is awesome or bad depending on your tastes!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Seems good to me. It's the only protein shake I've ever used so no way to compare but I've seen good results in just over 3 months. I use as a post workout as well as occasional meal replacement. Taste is surprisingly good. I actually look forward to it as a reward after finishing a good workout. The included recovery blend is a nice bonus as well. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: B Diddy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Flavor! Wish it came in 5lb tub!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what some of the complaints are about...this flavor is absolutely delicious! I drink it with milk so maybe that’s why. The only people I could see complain about flavor are the ones who mix it with water instead. My recommendation is to try it with milk and see how it tastes because for me it tastes like a delicious chocolate peanut butter shake lol. I use 2% milk with this after a workout and my muscles feel great the next day! This brand has been known to be spiked with Creatin but for the price I can’t complain. Helps tons with muscle recovery in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Cookies and Cream flavor is too sweet though
customer_reviews.text: I would not repurchase the cookies and cream flavor, it's way too sweet. I also have the chocolate protein by this brand which I really like, I have to mix the cookies and cream flavor with the chocolate so it's not too sweet, this combo is great, but I would not repurchase the cookies and cream, good protein for the cost though.
customer_reviews.author: RALMARAZ8A

customer_reviews.title: Good Great Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I was really having trouble taking in enough protein for what I was doing. I would be sore longer and feel lethargic. I started using the vanilla at first and it tasted good and gave me relief and built my muscles quickly. Then I tried chocolate which tasted even better and same results. Finally I came to my beloved peanut butter and chocolate flavor. I know I am not the only one that's nuts for peanut butter. After all majority of species on this planet like it. Not to mention many humans. This is tasty and kinda makes you want to drink it for a snack. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 20 Grams of Deliciousness
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a bit leery of products that cost a bit less than most of their competitors, especially when it comes to food. But this protein powder tastes far better than its price may lead you to believe. Not gritty and without much of an after taste, it's a solid choice for those looking to add some more protein to their diet. It's great in milk, soy milk, or water.
customer_reviews.author: For Bunk

customer_reviews.title: Used to Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: Then they changed the formula and increased the sodium (to-protein ratio) that now puts Body Fortress Super Advanced Whey Protein Powder OFF my allowed diet. Banana is the lowest in sodium... and palatable flavor. Wish they would bring the old product back. Good flavor, variety, low sodium (actually, until lately, was the lowest sodium-to-protein ratio than any other protein product on the market, including much more expensive designer brands. Body Fortress, please go back to the old mix!
customer_reviews.author: Josef S. Klus

customer_reviews.title: Great product; well-priced and great taste
customer_reviews.text: Great product; by far the best tasting and best value of any protein i have used. Strawberry is my favorite. I mix it with orange juice and it tastes great, but you can also mix it with milk if you prefer. It mixes easily as long as you mix it quickly after adding it to your beverage of choice. Been using this product for over 10 years and I go through 6-8 jars/year. Unlike other brands and flavors, i never tire of the taste
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I bought this thinking I would like it. Nope. It actually tastes gross and there's barely any strawberry taste. Really thinking of pitching the remaining product after making 4 drinks with it. Wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome sauce

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors
customer_reviews.text: Helps with my recovery after therapy sessions. Great flavor. Add fresh fruit or yogurt for a bigger boost.
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Ive no idea if this worked for me or not, or if it's even healthy or not. It did taste pretty good mixed with water though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful, and the label is a lie.
customer_reviews.text: First off, it tastes like strawberry flavored medicine, secondly, the label is misleading. It is NOT 200 calories with 60G of protein. That is impossible, as protein contains 4 calories per gram. To get 60G of protein, you have to drink 2 scoops, which is over 400 calories.
customer_reviews.author: Brady G.

customer_reviews.title: Not chocolate milk
customer_reviews.text: Whoever says that it tastes like chocolate milk is drinking some pretty bad chocolate milk. It honestly tastes like you put chocolate syrup in water. If you mix it with milk, it’s a little better, but then you have to make sure you put at least 8oz or it’ll be SUPER thick. It’s not bad but I was really expecting it to be more chocolatey. Also, the scoop is huge! One shake almost fills up my small shaker bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: good taste and great price
customer_reviews.text: good tasting vanilla flavored protein drink for the everyday person looking for a meal replacement. Normally I use muscle milk but decided to give this brand another try as the price was too good to pass up. Good texture and taste lead to recommendation for others to try as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: I need more protein and this sounded great
customer_reviews.text: The amount of protein in a serving is great. But the taste, even when mixed with other things that should mask the taste...well, nothing masks the taste. It sits on my counter accusingly...I know I need to take it and make a smoothie.But I just can't force myself. There must be a better way to get protein!
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: Large large double scoop needed to get to 60 grams
customer_reviews.text: 60 grams of protein but it’s 2 GIANT scoops to get there...not the greatest flavor or texture, but it’s a good filler that helps make the more expensive protein powders last longe. Normally I combine one scoop of this and one scoop of designer protein (Ghost Protein Chips Ahoy flavor)
customer_reviews.author: Sar

customer_reviews.title: Very soft vanilla taste, no grit, great add in!
customer_reviews.text: Great protein powder boost for any type of nutritional smoothie or Shake. I add one scoop of it to my Carnation Instant Breakfast and add small handful of any type of fruit I have on hand and it comes out great! It blends really well with no gritty taste to it. Very soft vanilla taste.
customer_reviews.author: CS Coffing

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: decent price but it tastes awful. it gets very foamy and gross. most protein shakes arent great anyways but this is probably one of the worst ive drank. switched to protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Jung

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: I tried several protein powders, and I find this brand having a better taste than the other ones I tried. Specifically, chocolate peanut butter has a very strong flavor in a good way, and I can use it in vegetable smoothies. The strong flavor masks the taste of vegetables if I try to sneak kale or broccoli.
customer_reviews.author: gprimosch

customer_reviews.title: GAINS!!!
customer_reviews.text: The gains I've been getting HOLLY FK. I just love it. I currently saving some money to get another month. I was on another brand and to be honest this one is way better than the last one. Maybe there is better out there but with this product you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Fitzgeralde

customer_reviews.title: Buy vanilla.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the vanilla in water was decent but not great. Then I tried the cookies and cream. I will only purchase vanilla in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The best protein powder on the market! ISOPURE is excellent but this powder is better. I've always used ISOPURE but this mixes & tastes better. It's a better buy to. It can be mixed with cold water & tastes great. I use 1 scoop with 8oz of unsweetened almond milk & a squirt of monk fruit sweetener. Twice a day. 30 grams of protein & low carb too!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product and taste well hopes it meets it's expectations.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the flavor he just started his workout regimen with this product. He's already slim and fit he just wanted a little more bulk...
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Little

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Using this every day after working out great taste easy to blend
customer_reviews.author: poundcake123

customer_reviews.title: Great for gains and great flavor
customer_reviews.text: These shakes have been great for increasing my muscle mass. Originally I tried the chocolate one and it was sickeningly sweet to me. I then tried it in water and it was awful as well. I ended up getting the strawberry one and it tastes great and is not overly sweet. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyO

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was cheaper than the chocolate flavor that I like. I had cookies and cream from a different protein powder and it tasted good, so I bought this one. This is perhaps the worst tasting powder I have tried. It tastes like very soggy corn flakes. Not sure how they thought cookies & cream from that. It also does not mix well and I constantly have dry powder at the bottom of my blender bottle.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Not vanilla!!
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this product for a while but something was wrong with the last one I received. It was awful!!! Don't know if it was a manufacturing mistake or what. Vanilla is the only flavor I like and that is what the label says but it tastes like banana. Yuck! Now I'm stuck with a whole container of this Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best for Price
customer_reviews.text: I normally get protein powder from BPI, but the price point of this powder grabbed my attention. I'm glad it did, because I haven't gone back to BPI since! There is barely any sugar and 60g of protein in each serving, which is incredible considering the price. I make mine with coconut milk, a frozen banana, and a scoop of peanut butter. I have other friends into fitness and when I've mad it for them, they say it's the best protein shake they've ever had. So creamy and delicious--like a milkshake.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Rentsch

customer_reviews.title: Results!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow talk about results. I have gotten a very noticeable increase in muscle mass sense using this product. I do two scoops in a 16 ounce bottle I drink about half of it before and the other half after and my usual workout routine. I am very impressed best value for the money by far.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Was worried but...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy it made my smoothie thick and creamy it was awesome... I was worried due to some of the comments about it being too sweet so i just used water, spinach, blueberries with chia and flex seeds and it turned out great just try it i feel great
customer_reviews.author: Char C

customer_reviews.title: Start my day!
customer_reviews.text: I have been advised to take in more protein. I started using this in morning coffee with coconut oil. No cream or sweetener necessary. Keeps me from getting hungry till the afternoon, but keeps my muscles fed. Great price , great product. I have taken this for 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Trev Clark

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY CHEAP PROTEIN INGREDIENTS !!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this protein powder again! Something isn’t right about it, it feels like it has sand in the mix. When you get down to the bottom and drink the last bit of it, it feels like you just drank sand. Very cheaply made product with cheap ingredients, that’s why it’s cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent post-workout powder that provides a hearty boost of protein in a single serving. It easily dissolves in either water or milk but the taste is not necessarily as good as other products. Regardless, it is a quality product and I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: J. McVay

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Got the peanut flavor, mixed with almond milk and you have a high protein peanut butter shake. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LOIS

customer_reviews.title: Nice senior citizen milkshake substitute
customer_reviews.text: Probably what makes me different from some other purchasers is I am disabled and over 65, making my exercise routines much less than they were in the past. Additionally eating habits are not what they were long ago so treats have to be carefully evaluated and protein intake checked. So besides providing additional protein, it also tastes very good and makes an excellent old guy's replacement for peanut butter milkshakes that are a thing of the distant past. I had been using six star but their product has become too inconsistent in the ability to dissolve and they don't have peanut butter flavor
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Keene

customer_reviews.title: Sickly sweet but blends well
customer_reviews.text: Agree with many reviewers wrt taste. Cloyingly sweet, shame this cannot be had unflavored. Might try chocolate instead. Otherwise, dissolves and blends well. We'll see about physical benefits, but glad i only tried the 2#.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Flavor was okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during Prime week. It tastes like a mix of cough syrup and vanilla at first. Once you get used to it, it’s easy to get down. But the first time drinking it took awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Good nutrients
customer_reviews.text: I have a peanut butter and banana shake with this in it every morning. You can't taste it. It blends well and I'm getting the added nutrients that I need. It lasts a while too. I use about a half of scoop every day.
customer_reviews.author: kemoe3

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: New powder for me. Glad I only bought the 2lb...too thick, not a great flavor. Will probably will finish container but will spend the extra$$ and buy the COMBAT powder next time...
customer_reviews.author: J. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Check Ingredients before buying.
customer_reviews.text: After a careful review and analysis seeing previous reviews, I have decided to put this rating on board. I believe what everyone says about this product is true and it does contain maltodextrin. I would recommend reading the lawsuit before buying it. I have bought about several times and not looking forward to buying it again. Waste of money, try something with legit protein. I will be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate tastes great, especially considering just how much protein is in this stuff. If I were the maker, I would call this flavor "Malted Chocolate" to be more precise. I think I saw another comment about the dosage being incorrect: my jug is 2 scoops = 60g. I usually just make mine with 1.5ish due to how thick it really gets. It's barely tolerable with water like the instructions say, but we all know that already - I just ran out of my preferred milk product.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: what a taste, and price
customer_reviews.text: I Loved the 1st cup I made, incredible taste - I keep the bottle in a cool place, 30gm of protein, strongly recommend it to all and thanks for the seller and speedy delivery by good people - My daughter love it.
customer_reviews.author: DrJim

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla tastes FANTASTIC and no soy!
customer_reviews.text: It tastes like a cake to me. Legitimately tastes GOOD, not just tolerable. After adding a bit of oats and a little bit of fruit, it tastes good enough to me that I would drink it just as a beverage, not a supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: If I had to describe the smell upon opening the container, it smells like walking into a freshly painted room that isn't properly ventilated. But once it's all blended together the taste isn't bad at all. Might NOT come with a scoop though. (mine didn't have one, despite other reviews having a scoop) First week of trying it out, so we'll see if it works in time...
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Protein Powder!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use this protein powder in our smoothies each morning. We mix with almond milk, spinach, frozen strawberries and blueberries, turmeric, chia seeds and flaxseed. Delicious and nutritious! I prefer the strawberry flavor the best, but my husband likes the cookies and cream. I have tried other protein powders and I like the way this one tastes the best. The flavor makes me crave a smoothie in the morning. I like the fact that the isolate protein is highly purified, it is gluten free and has creatine.
customer_reviews.author: handxpert

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying a pound of ON pretein powder because I thought it was too expensive. Well it turns out the serving size with Body Fortress is almost double so the price difference is not nearly as much as it seems. I guess it's my own fault for not paying close enough attention. The flavor is decent with milk. With water it's pretty bad. It's also much more difficult to mix than ON. ON is definitely worth the minimal price increase when you consider the serving sizes.
customer_reviews.author: jfitz98

product_meta.title: Body Fortress Super Advanced Whey Protein Powder, Gluten Free, Chocolate, 2 Pound
product_meta.description: Body Fortress Super Advanced Whey Protein is the ideal post workout protein supplement featuring 100 percent Premium Whey enhanced with Creatine and other critical Amino Acids. For adults, add one (1) scoop to 6 8 ounces or two (2) scoops to 14 16 ounces of your favorite beverage. Consume within 10 minutes after mixing. Take this product with an adequate daily fluid intake. Super Advanced Whey Protein can be taken immediately following exercise or as needed throughout the day in order to meet your daily protein requirements. Use in conjunction with an intense daily exercise program and a balanced diet including an adequate caloric intake. Stir: 20 30 seconds or until completely blended. Shake: cover and shake for 25 30 seconds. Blend: cover and blend for 20 30 seconds. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Per two scoop serving Contains Soy Lecithin for enhanced mixability Not intended for use by pregnant or nursing women. If you are taking any medications or have any medical condition, consult your doctor before use. Avoid this product if you have kidney disease. Discontinue use and consult your doctor if adverse reactions occur. Not intended for use by persons under the age of 18. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. STORE AT ROOM TEMPERATURE, TIGHTLY CLOSED AND AVOID EXCESSIVE HEAT. FOR YOUR PROTECTION, DO NOT USE IF SEAL UNDER CAP IS BROKEN OR MISSING.
feature_bullets: You will receive (1) jar of Body Fortress Super Advanced Whey Protein Powder, Chocolate, 2 pounds

IMPROVED TRAINING RECOVERY: Body Fortress Super Advanced Whey Protein Powder is enhanced with creatine and other critical amino acids, allowing you to train harder and rebuild lean muscle faster, because tomorrow's workout starts with today's recovery

CUSTOMIZE YOUR SUPPLEMENTS: Body Fortress provides a variety of pre, intra & post workout supplements to maximize the effectiveness of your workouts. Add Super Advanced Whey Protein to our mass building supplements to maximize your workout routine

AFFORDABLE SUPPLEMENTS: Body Fortress is committed to the idea that your gains should be a result of the level of your Dedication & Commitment, not the size of your budget, so our supplements are always the highest quality without being the highest price

COMPARE TO YOUR FAVORITES: Compare Body Fortress Supplements to Dymatize, Optimum Nutrition, Isopure, Orgain, BSN Syntha 6, MusclePharm, EAS, PlantFusion, Muscle Milk, Evlution, Six Star, MuscleTech, Vega, IntraCore, Quest Nutrition, Gatorade, or Ascent

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
